TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SKRepeatMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify whether the time value of a should cycle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.SpriteKit.SKRepeatMode Clamp = int32(1)

Docs.summary: After the last keyframe's time sequence is past, the last keyframe's value is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.SpriteKit.SKRepeatMode Loop = int32(2)

Docs.summary: After the last keyframe's time sequence is past, the sequence loops back to the first keyframe.
